profileAlternative.name: Jiajing Chen
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at HBO
profileAlternative.summary:
Experienced in predictive analytics, machine learning and statistical modeling.
Solid foundation in applied mathematics and statistics, especially in:
Probability, Statistical Learning, Statistical Inference, Regression Methods, Longitudinal and Time series, Probabilistic Models, Markov Chain, Bayesian Inference, MCMC, Stochastic Processes, Experimental Design, A/B Testing, etc.

Deep Learning enthusiast. Familiar with deep learning platform: TensorFlow, Keras, Pytorch, MXNet.
Proficient in R, Python, Java, C, SAS, SQL, Linux.

More than 3 years programming experience in Python and R. Hands-on experience in data cleaning, processing and handling with large dataset.

aboutAlternative.text:
Experienced in predictive analytics, machine learning and statistical modeling.
Solid foundation in applied mathematics and statistics, especially in:
Probability, Statistical Learning, Statistical Inference, Regression Methods, Longitudinal and Time series, Probabilistic Models, Markov Chain, Bayesian Inference, MCMC, Stochastic Processes, Experimental Design, A/B Testing, etc.

Deep Learning enthusiast. Familiar with deep learning platform: TensorFlow, Keras, Pytorch, MXNet.
Proficient in R, Python, Java, C, SAS, SQL, Linux.

More than 3 years programming experience in Python and R. Hands-on experience in data cleaning, processing and handling with large dataset.

given.text: Jiajing is a well-rounded data scientist with a strong skillset to perform insightful analyses. She has in-depth knowledge of probability and statistical theory along with strong familiarity with advanced machine learning algorithms. She is a highly proficient R and Python programmer. During her internship, she was a great team player and quickly grasped important business concepts relevant to the analysis. Given her thoughtful disposition and technical strengths, she would be a great asset to any data science team looking to perform robust data analytics. See less

Jiajing has considerable depth of knowledge in the modeling space, and she also has tremendous potential for putting together compelling presentations that convey complex, technical concepts to non-technical audiences. During her time with Nationwide, she was resourceful, self-sufficient, and a strong team player. She is strongly positioned for success in the data science space. See less

items: Kaggle Facial Expression Classification, Deep Learning, CNN
Kaggle: House price Prediction, Regression, Lasso, random forests, top 15%
Machine Learning Application in Computational Biology, Ubiquitination sites Prediction, SVM, RF, Front-End Web Server
Prediction of Protein Ubiquitination Sites in Arabidopsis thaliana
